price: Nokorε sε, wͻn ayera nnipa pii; na abͻneεfoͻ no deε (Awurade), εmma wͻn nnya nkͻsoͻ biara, na mmom ma wͻnyera anna ma wͻnsopa.
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
